timeline.message:
:art: made ReadableGraph an AutoCloseable in order to support try-with-resources
:art: deleted the unused GraphUtilities class
:art: moved Timer, IntHashSet and ImmutableObjectCache to the Utilities module
:art: added hundreds of finals

timeline.author: arcturus2

timeline.bodyText: The package name is called timer so this like has no effect. Did you want to make the timer package public? It seemed to compile without this line.
timeline.author: arcturus2

replies.bodyText: @cygnus-x-1 just letting you know about this comment in case you missed it.
